name: Island Life (itch) (aquila12, Jojomo)
description:
Use your powers to bring life to a barren island in an endless ocean. Water the wastes to bring forth forests, split the earth to raise mountains, then burn it all to the ground to rebuild from the ashes!

As you develop the land, creatures will begin to populate the environment. Can you build a home for the humble crab? How about the uppity koala? Maybe you can RELEASE THE KRAKEN!

Also, there are unicorns.

Controls:

  • Left-click: Use current action (see top right) on map tile OR change action (top button in toolbar at bottom right) OR end turn (lower button in toolbar).
  • Right-click: Remove action from tile
